Description: Bronze mirror-case; cast and incised; raised sides; concentric circles, moulded or incised, on the inside surface; traces of polished surface on the outside.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Curium
Curator's comments: See: J.-M. Chavane, La nécropole d'Amathonte. Tombs 113-367. IV. Les petits objets (Nicosia 1990), pp 14-15 for Hellenistic and Roman examples from Amathus.
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.83, Tomb 77 no. 4)
